location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Several words on each line of the right hand side of the letter have been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging a communication dated 19 December 1816 and reporting that the Board approves of the Resident's progress at Lingau [Bandar-e-Lengeh] and Charrack [Bandar-e-Charak] and his communication with Sultan Suggur [Sulṭān bin Saqr] of Shargaa [Sharjah].
